____________________________________________________________________________________

**The Most Anticipated Season of the Year!**

Our last Black Friday was crazy, and we intend to make this year even crazier. If you have missed any deals last year that made you regret, we promise to make up to you this time with irresistible offerings during this Black Friday & Cyber Monday 2021. However, the packages are offered in a limited time frame only, so grab it before it is all gone!

____________________________________________________________________________________

There are two parts of our sales, both very exciting:

**I. Flash Sales Hunt on Black Friday and Cyber Monday**
 
These are exclusive deals freshly created to be offered on the main sales day of Black Friday – November 26 and Cyber Monday – November 29, 2021 - 0:00 AM to 11.59 PM UTC+0.
The deals will be available for a limited period of time and limited slots in the following link: https://greencloudvps.com/billing/store/black-friday-2021

**II. Discount Codes Applicable to Non-promotional Plans**

**1. GET 50% OFF RECCURRING**
– on all NVMe Windows, Ryzen KVM VPS and NVMe KVM VPS with the annual, biennial and triennial payments
– Code: **BF50**
**2. GET 40% OFF RECCURRING**
– on all Windows VPS & KVM VPS with the annual, biennial and triennial payments
– Code: **BF40**

You dont want to wait? We have several Early Black Friday plans available already via this link: https://greencloudvps.com/billing/store/black-friday-2021
Hurry as they will not last long! 

____________________________________________________________________________________

**Pre-order plans**

We are expanding to Hong Kong DC2 and Tokyo with lots of new stuff like Ryzen 5950x/3960x, 10Gbps and NVMe 4.0! As promised, we are opening pre-order plans with discounts that you dont want to miss! These plans will be available at 0:00 AM UTC+0 November 26, with limited stocks, can be ordered at https://greencloudvps.com/billing/store/black-friday-2021

**1. Ryzen10Gbps-2 - $25/year**

    - RAM: 2048MB
    - Hard drive: 25GB NVMe 4.0
    - CPU: 1 core Ryzen @ 3.5GHz+
    - IPv4: 1
    - IPv6: /112
    - Bandwidth: 500GB
    - Port: 10Gbps
    - OS: Linux
    - Location: Hong Kong DC2/Tokyo, JP
    - Control Panel: SolusVM
    Note: This is a pre-order plan, VPS will be delivered in December. Double Storage and Bandwidth for Triennial payments.

**1. Ryzen10Gbps-3 - $35/year**

    - RAM: 3072MB
    - Hard drive: 35GB NVMe 4.0
    - CPU: 2 cores Ryzen @ 3.5GHz+
    - IPv4: 1
    - IPv6: /112
    - Bandwidth: 750GB
    - Port: 10Gbps
    - OS: Linux
    - Location: Hong Kong DC2/Tokyo, JP
    - Control Panel: SolusVM
    Note: This is a pre-order plan, VPS will be delivered in December. Double Storage and Bandwidth for Triennial payments.

**Looking Glass/Test file** can be found here: https://greencloudvps.com/data-centers.php
